Use a walking stick or cane to help you move backwards. You can place the stick in front of you and use it as a guide as you walk backwards.
Use a skateboard or rollerblades to move backwards. You can simply slide your feet backwards on the board or blades.
Use a backpack or a large bag to carry your belongings. You can place the bag in front of you and use it as a guide as you walk backwards.
Use a pair of crutches to help you move backwards. You can place the crutches in front of you and use them as a guide as you walk backwards.
Use a bicycle or scooter to move backwards. You can simply pedal backwards to move the vehicle in that direction.
